verbs.description: [V: Seeking] [ARG1: to comfort grieving families and shaken survivors] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] spent more than an hour privately Thursday with some of those impacted by a Texas mass school shooting that killed 10 and wounded more than a dozen on May 18 .
